meanings.definition: The flat triangular bone at the front of the knee joint.
meanings.sent1: Her patella was injured during the soccer game.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her patella to check for any fractures.
meanings.sent3: The patella decided to take a break from all the jumping and running.
meanings.sent4: The patella was as sturdy as a rock, supporting her every move.
meanings.sent5: The patella, like a loyal guard, protected her knee joint from harm.

meanings.definition: A small flat dish or pan used for baking or serving food.
meanings.sent1: She placed the freshly baked cookies on the patella.
meanings.sent2: The chef used a shiny patella to serve the appetizers.
meanings.sent3: The patella was too small to hold all the pasta for the party.
meanings.sent4: The patella gleamed under the restaurant lights, showcasing the delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: The patella, like a tiny stage, presented the culinary masterpiece to the guests.
